title: Poison Gas Trap
description: A disguised metal plate on the floor releases a colorless, faintly sweet poison gas when stepped on. The gas causes disorientation and respiratory issues, quickly incapacitating or killing intruders. This trap effectively guards important areas.

title: Spiked Pit
description: A hidden pit covered with a false floor springs open under weight, revealing sharp spikes below. Falling victims suffer severe injuries from the impalement, making this trap a lethal deterrent in secure areas.

effect.description: Weaknes by bleeding from trap hit.
